summary: Email correspondence between legal teams regarding the proposed jury questionnaires for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The sender provides two attachments: a defense version with slight edits and a more robust prosecution version, noting difficulties in merging the two and plans for further conferral.

events.title: Jury Questionnaire Conferral
events.description: Legal teams exchange proposed jury questionnaires and plan to confer on voir dire questions for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated October 8, 2021, concerning the Ghislaine Maxwell trial jury selection process.
The prosecution and defense had difficulties merging their respective proposed jury questionnaires.
The prosecution attached a more robust proposed questionnaire and noted they were working on a more inclusive version of proposed voir dire questions for further conferral.
